fullText: Blair Underwood brings a welcome dignity to Stanley Kowalski, though he lacks the animal magnetism that makes the character so dangerously seductive.
dtliExcerpt: Blair Underwood brings a welcome dignity to Stanley Kowalski, though he lacks the animal magnetism that makes the character so dangerously seductive.
